questions.question: Say true or false. *inner text* -> this will make inner text to be in italics.
___ is used to render a text with strikethrough.
___ is used to render a text in bold.
Which of the following will result in ordered list item
Say true or false. Unordered lists can be made using asterisks, pluses, or hyphen.
Which is one of the method create links in markdown?
Say true or false. Horizontal rules are easily added with three or more asterisks or hyphens, with or without spaces.
Which of the following is a way to display an image?
choices: [This is the alt-attribute for my image](http://imgur.com/myimage.jpg "An optional title")
![This is the alt-attribute for my image](http://imgur.com/myimage.jpg "An optional title")
*[This is the alt-attribute for my image](http://imgur.com/myimage.jpg "An optional title")
questions.answer: ![This is the alt-attribute for my image](http://imgur.com/myimage.jpg "An optional title")
